|Type

|Name
|HQDM_class_of_physical_object

|IRI

|Subclass of
|:HQDM_class_of_individual

|Subclass of
|:HQDM_class_of_state_of_physical_object

|Comment
|might be used to specify categories/kinds of states (ex.  that could then be members of respective classes (so classes of categories or events)
- the main usage of "class_of_state" in HQDM is for specifying physical properties, physical qualities, and roles (as classes of participants)
- also used to specify "currency (money)", sign representations, etc. 
- this may not be necessary in the CoreOntology
